meanings.definition: Focused on or centered around the male sex organ.
meanings.sent1: The phallocentric statue in the park was a topic of discussion among the children.
meanings.sent2: The phallocentric nature of the ancient artwork was evident to the art historians.
meanings.sent3: The phallocentric joke at the party made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His phallocentric mindset towered over his interactions with others.
meanings.sent5: The phallocentric imagery in the painting left a lasting impression on the viewers.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or emphasizing male dominance or superiority.
meanings.sent1: The phallocentric society often overlooked the contributions of women.
meanings.sent2: His phallocentric attitude made it challenging for him to collaborate with his female colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The phallocentric advertisement received criticism for its outdated portrayal of gender roles.
meanings.sent4: In the phallocentric world of business, she had to work twice as hard to be recognized.
meanings.sent5: The phallocentric leadership style alienated many team members.
